go vet example.com/m
! stdout .
go vet main.go
! stdout .

go vet -x -json example.com/m
stderr '"GoVersion": "go1.22.0"'
go vet -x -json main.go
stderr '"GoVersion": "go1.22.0"'

-- go.mod --
module example.com/m

go 1.22.0


-- main.go --
package main

func main() {
        for i := range 10 {
                go func() { println(i) }()
        }
}
